verses.verse: A <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> [accepts his] father's <S%H4148>discipline,<s%> But a <S%H9238>scoffer<s%> does not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to <S%H1606>rebuke.<s%>
From the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of a man's <S%H6310>mouth<s%> he <S%H398>enjoys<s%> <S%H9185>good,<s%> But the <S%H5315>desire<s%> of the <S%H898>treacherous<s%> is <S%H2555>violence.<s%>
The one who <S%H5341>guards<s%> his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H8104>preserves<s%> his <S%H5315>life;<s%> The one who <S%H6589>opens<s%> <S%H6589>wide<s%> his <S%H8193>lips<s%> comes to <S%H4288>ruin.<s%>
The <S%H5315>soul<s%> of the <S%H6102>sluggard<s%> <S%H183>craves<s%> and [gets] <S%H369>nothing,<s%> But the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of the <S%H9167>diligent<s%> is <S%H1878>made<s%> <S%H1878>fat.<s%>
A <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H6662>man<s%> <S%H8130>hates<s%> <S%H8267>falsehood,<s%> But a <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H7563>man<s%> <S%H887>acts<s%> <S%H887>disgustingly<s%> and <S%H2659>shamefully.<s%>
<S%H6666>Righteousness<s%> <S%H5341>guards<s%> the one whose <S%H1870>way<s%> is <S%H8537>blameless,<s%> But <S%H7564>wickedness<s%> <S%H5557>subverts<s%> the <S%H9128>sinner.<s%>

<S%H3426>There<s%> is one who <S%H6238>pretends<s%> to be <S%H6238>rich,<s%> but <S%H369>has<s%> <S%H369>nothing<s%><S%H3605>;<s%> [Another] <S%H7326>pretends<s%> to be <S%H7326>poor,<s%> but has <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H1952>wealth.<s%>
The <S%H3724>ransom<s%> of a man's <S%H5315>life<s%> is his <S%H6239>riches,<s%> But the <S%H7326>poor<s%> <S%H8085>hears<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1606>rebuke.<s%>
The <S%H216>light<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H8055>rejoices,<s%> But the <S%H5216>lamp<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H1846>goes<s%> out.
Through <S%H2087>presumption<s%> <S%H5414>comes<s%> <S%H7534>nothing<s%> but <S%H4683>strife,<s%> But with those who <S%H3289>receive<s%> <S%H3289>counsel<s%> is <S%H2451>wisdom.<s%>
<S%H1952>Wealth<s%> [obtained] by <S%H1892>fraud<s%> <S%H4591>dwindles,<s%> But the one who <S%H6908>gathers<s%> by <S%H3027>labor<s%> <S%H7235>increases<s%> [it.]
<S%H8431>Hope<s%> <S%H4900>deferred<s%> <S%H2470>makes<s%> the <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H2470>sick,<s%> But <S%H8378>desire<s%> <S%H935>fulfilled<s%> is a <S%H6086>tree<s%> of <S%H9132>life.<s%>
The one who <S%H936>despises<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> will be in <S%H9111>debt<s%> to it, But the one who <S%H3372>fears<s%> the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> will be <S%H9608>rewarded.<s%>
The <S%H8451>teaching<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise<s%> is a <S%H4726>fountain<s%> of <S%H9132>life,<s%> To <S%H5493>turn<s%> <S%H5493>aside<s%> from the <S%H4170>snares<s%> of <S%H4194>death.<s%>
<S%H2896>Good<s%> <S%H7922>understanding<s%> <S%H5414>produces<s%> <S%H2580>favor,<s%> But the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H898>treacherous<s%> is <S%H386>hard.<s%>
<S%H3605>Every<s%> <S%H6175>prudent<s%> <S%H6175>man<s%> <S%H6213>acts<s%> with <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%> But a <S%H3684>fool<s%> <S%H6566>displays<s%> <S%H200>folly.<s%>
A <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H4397>messenger<s%> <S%H5307>falls<s%> into <S%H9563>adversity,<s%> But a <S%H529>faithful<s%> <S%H6735>envoy<s%> [brings] <S%H4832>healing.<s%>
<S%H7389>Poverty<s%> and <S%H7036>shame<s%> [will come] to him who <S%H6544>neglects<s%> <S%H4148>discipline,<s%> But he who <S%H8104>regards<s%> <S%H9640>reproof<s%> will be <S%H3513>honored.<s%>
<S%H8378>Desire<s%> <S%H1961>realized<s%> is <S%H6149>sweet<s%> to the <S%H5315>soul,<s%> But it is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to <S%H3684>fools<s%> to <S%H5493>depart<s%> from <S%H9563>evil.<s%>
He who <S%H1980>walks<s%> with <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H2450>men<s%> will be <S%H2449>wise,<s%> But the <S%H9565>companion<s%> of <S%H3684>fools<s%> will <S%H7489>suffer<s%> <S%H7489>harm.<s%>
<S%H9567>Adversity<s%> <S%H7291>pursues<s%> <S%H2400>sinners,<s%> But the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> will be <S%H9608>rewarded<s%> with <S%H9185>prosperity.<s%>

A <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H2896>man<s%> <S%H5157>leaves<s%> an <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> to his <S%H1121>children<s%>'s children, And the <S%H2428>wealth<s%> of the <S%H2398>sinner<s%> is <S%H6845>stored<s%> up for the <S%H6662>righteous.<s%>

<S%H7230>Abundant<s%> <S%H400>food<s%> [is in] the <S%H5215>fallow<s%> <S%H5215>ground<s%> of the <S%H7326>poor,<s%> But it is <S%H5595>swept<s%> <S%H5595>away<s%> by <S%H3808>injustice.<s%> <S%H4941><s%>
He who <S%H2820>spares<s%> his <S%H7626>rod<s%> <S%H8130>hates<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> But he who <S%H157>loves<s%> him <S%H4148>disciplines<s%> him <S%H7836>diligently.<s%>
The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H398>has<s%> <S%H398>enough<s%> to <S%H7648>satisfy<s%> his <S%H5315>appetite,<s%> But the <S%H990>stomach<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is in <S%H2637>want.<s%>
